rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0001
rows.name: What a great view!

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0002
rows.name: Are you happy now, Kubira?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0003
rows.name: Hey, that's quite a view.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0004
rows.name: What's your opinion, Kubira?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0005
rows.name: What a magnificent view...

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0006
rows.name: What do you think, Kubira?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0007
rows.name: Wow, what an incredible view...

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0008
rows.name: Are you satisfied now, Kubira?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0009
rows.name:
...Well, it's not as impressive
as I expected

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0010
rows.name:
I question the taste of anyone
who would call this a spectacular view.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0011
rows.name:
But I don't think it's
that bad of a view?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0012
rows.name:
Hmm, I suppose
from a commoner's perspective
that might be true.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0013
rows.name:
What!?
Did you just call us commoners...?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0014
rows.name: Don't take it so hard.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0015
rows.name:
It's only natural that I have a
different sense of beauty than you all.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0016
rows.name:
Then should we find a view
that would satisfy Kubira?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0017
rows.name: Don't trouble yourself.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0018
rows.name:
It's unlikely that we'd find
such a view anyway.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0019
rows.name: It would merely be a waste of time.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0020
rows.name: I have question for Kubira...

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0021
rows.name: You may speak.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0022
rows.name: Why do you always seem so negative?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0023
rows.name:
You do seem tired, or more like
you act high and mighty but
don't seem motivated.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0024
rows.name: You are mistaken.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0025
rows.name: ...Why should I have to show enthusiasm?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0026
rows.name:
But in battle
you need to give it your all.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0027
rows.name:
Yes!
If you don't try your hardest,
you'll be beaten.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0028
rows.name:
That would be due to the Driver's
lack of skill, wouldn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0029
rows.name:
Then it's the Driver who
needs to get serious...

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0030
rows.name:
There's no reason why
I should have to fight at full strength.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0031
rows.name: Even Tora is shocked by this logic!

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0032
rows.name:
I can't believe a Blade
would think like this
It's unbelievable...

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0033
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0034
rows.name: You're acting like a king, Kubira

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0035
rows.name: I'm done with you, Kubira.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0036
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0037
rows.name: You act exactly like a king, Kubira.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0038
rows.name: I think it's time to part ways with you.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0039
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0040
rows.name: You behave exactly like a king, Kubira.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0041
rows.name: This is where we say goodbye to you.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0042
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0043
rows.name: Kubira has a royal-sized attitude.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0044
rows.name: Let's say goodbye to Kubira here.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0101
rows.name: Of course.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0102
rows.name: I was the ruler of a nation.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0103
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0104
rows.name: Eh?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0105
rows.name: What?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0106
rows.name: Come again?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0107
rows.name:
Kubira was a ruler?
...This is news to Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0108
rows.name:
There's no way a Blade
could be a king.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0109
rows.name:
To be precise, I was a king
before I became a Blade.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0110
rows.name:
Treating a king like me as a mere Blade
would typically be a grave offense.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0111
rows.name:
Since I'd be in trouble if my Driver
died in battle I'm enduring this
irritating treatment with great patience.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0112
rows.name:
But, but, you don't have
any past memories, do you?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0113
rows.name: Having memories or not doesn't matter

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0114
rows.name:
It is an undeniable fact
that I was the ruler of a nation.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0115
rows.name:
Someday, you all will learn
about my magnificent legacy.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0116
rows.name: Sigh.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0201
rows.name: What!?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0202
rows.name: Are you saying you'll abandon me?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0203
rows.name: A mere vassal would discard their king?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0301
rows.name: I'm the one who should be sighing.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0302
rows.name:
But it's fortunate that
I've gained one insight.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0303
rows.name:
Because now I know why
you don't show me
proper respect and fear.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0304
rows.name:
To think you couldn't perceive
that I am royalty,
a being of noble standing...

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0305
rows.name:
Now you understand
I have no intention of using my power
for your benefit.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0306
rows.name:
I will only use my power
when I myself consider it necessary.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0307
rows.name:
So, take care of all the
bothersome tasks yourselves.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0308
rows.name:
Got it? Don't disturb me
with petty issues.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0309
rows.name: Sigh...

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0310
rows.name: Sigh...

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0311
rows.name: I see[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0312
rows.name: Sigh...
